hanzi-su-wiki:
僅

Значения

Лишь, только

Мнемоника

Справа — сухая почва в значении «глина для лепки божков», человечков 亻 используемых в ритуальных целях и размером много меньше натурального.

Варианты

仅

purpleculture_examples: 僅僅 [ jǐn jǐn ]: barely; only; merely; only (this and nothing more)

heisig_chinese_memo: To Mr. T swallowing a whole cabbage is merely a veggie snack for him.
heisig_constituent: trifle, person, cabbage, flowers, mouth, grow up
koohiiStory1: To a big guy like Mr. T, eating a whole cabbage at once is nothing. "What? a cabbage? That's just a trifle, foo, where's the meat?".
koohiiStory2: To MR.T swallowing a whole CABBAGE is no more than a TRIFLE.
jp_example_words:
僅(きん): a little, small quantity
僅か(わずか): only, merely, a little, small quantity
Ru_Radicals: 化 (превращаться), 口 (рот), 土 (земля), 艾 (мокса)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the violet (堇) man (亻) is very little
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: It seems like a man is merely a big crotch sometimes, but he's more than that.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of "人", "堇", used as an adverb to express talent and only. "Shuowen": "The material is also capable. From the human, the singular voice." "Mandarin ‧ Zhou Yuzhong": "Today the disaster falls in the Zhou room, and the remaining one can only guard the house."

" Only " also refers to a small amount. "The Three Years of Gongyang Zhuan·Henggong": "What is the age? There is only a year. What is the great year? The year is also great." He Xiu's note: "Only, still inferior. There are as many as possible, and it cannot be mature."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " person " and "堇", used as an adverb to express talent and only.
humanum_full_description:
從「人」，「堇」聲，用作副詞，表示才、只。《說文》：「材能也。从人，堇聲。」《國語‧周語中》：「今天降災於周室，余一人僅能守府。」

　　「僅」也指數量少。《公羊傳‧恆公三年》：「此其曰有年何？僅有年也。彼其曰大有年何?大豐年也。」何休注：「僅，猶劣也，謂五穀多少皆有，不能大成熟。」
humanum_short_description: 從「人」，「堇」聲，用作副詞，表示才、只。

僅(きん): a little, small quantity
僅か(わずか): only, merely, a little, small quantity

從「 人 」，「 堇 」聲，用作副詞，表示才、只。《說文》：「材能也。从人，堇聲。」《國語‧周語中》：「今天降災於周室，余一人僅能守府。」 「 僅 」也指數量少。《公羊傳‧恆公三年》：「此其曰有年何？僅有年也。彼其曰大有年何?大豐年也。」何休注：「僅，猶劣也，謂五穀多少皆有，不能大成熟。」
From the sound of " 人", " 堇", used as an adverb to express talent and only. "Shuowen": "The material is also capable. From the human, the singular voice." "Mandarin ‧ Zhou Yuzhong": "Today the disaster falls in the Zhou room, and the remaining one can only guard the house." " Only" also refers to a small amount. "The Three Years of Gongyang Zhuan·Henggong": "What is the age? There is only a year. What is the great year? The year is also great." He Xiu's note: "Only, still inferior. There are as many as possible, and it cannot be mature."

僅字的基本解释

僅
jǐn

僅
jìn
均见“仅”。

僅字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jǐn］
［《廣韻》渠遴切，去震，羣。］
“仅1”的繁体字。“堇2”的被通假字。
(1)副词。才；只；仅仅。
(2)指数量少。
[②]［jìn］
［《廣韻》渠遴切，去震，羣。］
“仅2”的繁体字。
几乎；接近。

僅字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　僅； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页115第20
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】渠吝切【正韻】具吝切，?音覲。【說文】纔能也。　又少也，餘也。通作堇廑。亦作㢙。【禮·射義】蓋㢙有存者。　又劣也。

僅字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

暂无。

(2) Refers to a small number.
